#include<stdio.h>
#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
 int cases;
 scanf("%d",&cases);
 int n,a,b,count,total;
 for(int i=0;i<cases;i++)
 {
   scanf("%d",&n);
   a=1;
   count=0;total=0;
   for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
   {
     scanf("%d",&b);
     if(a!=b){if(count>total)total=count;count=0;a=b;}
     else count++;
   }
   if(count>total)total=count;
   printf("%d\n",total);
 }
 return 0;
}
